About Phalanx

What It Is

Phalanx is a tactical two-player card duel built on standard playing cards and formalized into a deterministic digital game engine.

Design Direction

  • Keep the tabletop spirit while making digital play practical.
  • Make core mechanics transparent and testable.
  • Use clear contracts for rules, protocol, and state transitions.

Who It Is For

  • Players who enjoy tactical head-to-head combat.
  • Playtesters interested in game balance and UX clarity.
  • Developers who care about deterministic game systems.
  • Supporters who want to back an early-stage indie game project.

Current State

Phalanx is in pre-alpha active development. Core gameplay is playable now, while reliability and polish continue to improve.

See current status.
